title: RH sensor moved
description: The relative humidity sensor at level one was located under a blue tarp.  It is now covered by a radiation shield and mounted ~3.5 feet from the forest floor, ~10 feet east of the datalogger boxes.  The relative humidity sensor at level 2 was located in a pvc pipe next to the ground.  It is now covered by a radiation sensor and mounted ~3.5 feet from the forest floor, ~ 10 feet west of the datalogger boxes.  The relative humidity sensor at level 3 was located under the wood enclosure. It is now covered by a radiation shield and mounted ~3.5 feet from the forest floor next to the data logger boxes.   Comments:[1/25/2010 Ginger] Flagged 48 datavalues where (LocalDateTime >= '2009-09-11 08:00:51' and LocalDateTime <= '2009-09-11 16:00:51') and (DatastreamID=376 or DatastreamID=378 or DatastreamID=388) incident report migrated from SensorDB.
